artist: Utagawa Kuniyoshi; Published by Kagaya Kichiemon
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: seated male figure in LRQ accompanied by a green bug-eyed demon-type figures wearing blue loincloth with star patterning and a white cloth with blue spots around its neck; man wear garment of various patterns--outer kimono is blue with white swirling and spotted pattern; seated man turns his head toward a standing young man at left wearing a green kimono with checkerboard medallions on the sleeves, who looks down at the seated man
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Seal

dialogues Ichiyūsai Kuniyoshi ga
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Memorial Portraits of  Iwai Hanshirō VI and Bandō Mitsugorō III
